pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FTP server to transfer files between machines with zero configuration## Usage1. `python3 -m pip install python-ftp-server`2. `python3 -m python_ftp_server -d "dirctory/to/share"`will print:```bashLocal address: ftp://<IP>:60000User: <USER>Password: <PASSWORD>```3. Copy and paste your `IP`, `USER`, `PASSWORD`, `PORT` into [FileZilla](https://filezilla-project.org/) (or any other FTP client):![](https://github.com/Red-Eyed/python_ftp_server/raw/master/img.png)
